snippet: The police said the teenagers sent photographs and video via Snapchat to friends of the victim’s sister.
abstract: Police in Pierce County, Washington, arrest three boys on charges of sexually assaulting 15-year-old girl and later posting pictures and video on social media.
lead_paragraph: The police said the teenagers sent photographs and video via Snapchat to friends of the victim’s sister.

headline.main: Washington: 3 Teenagers Accused of Videotaped Sex Attack on Girl, 15
headline.print_headline: Washington: 3 Teenagers Accused of Videotaped Sex Attack on Girl, 15
